loopstock | Frontend && Backend && DevOps Engineers | Berlin, Germany | Full-Time | Onsite

https://www.loopstock.io/jobs

At Loopstock we are building a real time inventory management system for hospitals. Using RFID technology, we autonomously track consumables from delivery to usage, freeing up the valuable time of caregivers. With our data driven approach, we enable hospitals to make better decisions in stock management; support procurement and supply chain management to lower the cost of hospital operations; and keep patients safe.

Working with: kubernetis, docker, python, mqtt, sql, react and redux
